titles.title: Now To Him Who Is Able: Jude

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now to Him who is able To keep you from stumbling, And to make you stand In the presence of His glory Blameless with great joy,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To the only God our Savior Through Jesus Christ our Lord, Be glory, majesty, dominion and authority, Before all time and now and forever. Amen.{/lang-eng}
